about_the_game:
Descend into the madness of the Backrooms in this mind-bending horror anthology.

Plunge into the first of five tales set in the infamous liminal space where reality unravels. Experience endless yellow corridors, survive terrifying encounters, and unravel the mysteries of this ever-shifting nightmare realm. Your choices shape the story, leading to multiple endings and revealing the true nature of the Backrooms.

Immerse yourself in an eerie atmosphere of flickering lights and unsettling sounds as you explore this reality-defying realm. Face psychological horrors that challenge your sanity and experience surreal events that blur the line between reality and nightmare. Make decisions and feel the weight of consequences as you fight to maintain your grip on reality.

Will you uncover the secrets of the Backrooms, or become another lost soul wandering its endless corridors? Your journey into madness begins now.

Immerse yourself in an eerie atmosphere of flickering lights and unsettling sounds as you explore this reality-defying realm. Make decisions and feel the weight of consequences as you fight to maintain your grip on reality.

Will you uncover the secrets of the Backrooms, or become another lost soul wandering its endless corridors? Your journey into madness begins now.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any modern Linux distribution / SteamOS
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any built-in graphics card
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Built-in audio
  • VR Support: N/A

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.6 (Snow Leopard) or later
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any built-in graphics card
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Built-in audio

name: Backrooms Stories Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP or later
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any built-in graphics card
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Built-in audio
  • VR Support: N/A

short_description: Read the first of five horror stories set in the Backrooms. Experience existential horror and terrifying encounters while making choices that will alter your fate. Will you escape or be lost forever? Wishlist now to be notified on release!
